entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The .editorconfig option for end_of_line does not work with format document #71616
  • Integration tests are not monitoring the real VM build we shipped #71610
  • IDE0305 produces invalid code for Add/AddRange #71607
  • Add MinimumSeverity to FixAllContext #71605
  • Nullable Warning when custom Equality Operator is used to generate an Expression Tree #71603
  • `NullableWalker.ReachableBottomState` doesn't behave as the overridden member doc comment describes #71602
  • "System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not find System.Private.CoreLib.dll" in Release-mode MAUI application #71600
  • Update roslyn syntax list constructs to support collection expressions. #71596

Closed

  • Add Compilation parameter to EmitBaseline.CreateInitialBaseline (breaking change) #70413
  • Removing Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler #71024
    17.10
  • InvalidProgramException when returning a ref field assignment in a property #71369
    17.10
  • EnC: Avoid completion of non-updated symbols #70212
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Only use ReadyToRun on Release builds #71622
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [cherry-pick] Fix build definition #71621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WIP: Merged todd #71620
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Unify linked documents when creating preview workspaces #71619
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't create the InheritanceMarginTagger for preview views. #71618
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Classification caching. #71617
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle the 'WSL is not installed' error #71614
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support producing a collection expression constructed from other spreaded collection expressions #71611
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add IDisposable to KeyValueLogMessage #71608
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure thread-safety in aggregated telemetry #71606
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify the work with generated BoundNodes and emit the xml comments as doc comment in the generated code file #71601
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Include buildhost deps.json #71597
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Harden some codepaths from producing null #71595
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Revert "Merge pull request #71412 from vibeeshan025/main" #71612
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ignore the exception from IntraTextAdornmentTagger #71615
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [cherry-pick] Fix build definition #71613
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Params Collections: Add a bunch of PROTOTYPE comments and a couple of VB tests. #71598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Move to 8.0 #71507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update MSBuild.StructuredLogger #71576
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix build #71609
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `features/roles` #71588
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not compile all types during ENC #71254
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove `ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler` #71579
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix ref field load in assignment #71566
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #71594
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove properties from DocumentSpan #71587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #71624
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71623
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update ILVerify bits #71544
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Preserve the whitespaces when rewriting an inheritdoc #71589
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fixes nested code actions in LSP bug #71456
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and package references #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add severity filter to Fix All operations #71486
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: require applicable constructor and Add method for target type implementing IEnumerable #71592
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Core test #71590
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Unify how we pass and choose pools #71584
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update code to use collection expressions #71591
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disallow `ref` to `in`/`ref readonly` method parameter conversion #71531
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Start local function analysis in unreachable state #71506
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Move to value-tasks in asset lookup #71360
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Turn Semantic Snippets off by default #71583
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Separate the process of creating an event accessor parameter and the process of figuring out its type. #71497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Fix rethrowing in nested async catch #71578
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update other BCL to 8.0.0 #71516
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
